issue.title: Upgrade ORC to 1.6.9
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13506](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13506). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, C++ module uses ORC 1.6.6 and Java module uses ORC 1.5.5.
The latest version is Apache ORC 1.6.9.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13506?focusedCommentId=17390684) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10838
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10838>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13506?focusedCommentId=17390688) by Chao Sun (csun):*
